original_text: It will be very bad for you teachers of God's Law! You have studied God's message. But you do not then accept it. You have also stopped people who really wanted to know God's message. Then they could not go on to accept it and go into God's kingdom.’
korean_text: 화 있을진저 너희 율법교사여 너희가 지식의 열쇠를 가져가서 너희도 들어가지 않고 또 들어가고자 하는 자도 막았느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you teachers of God's Law!
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 율법을 가르치는 너희에게 화가 있으리라!

sentences.original_text: But you do not then accept it.
who really wanted to know God's message.
sentences.korean_translation: 정말로 하나님의 말씀을 알고 싶어 했던 사람들을.

sentences.original_text: Then they could not go on to accept it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그것을 받아들일 수 없었고
